title: La Liga Chief Javier Tebas Takes His Feud With PSG President to Court
description: A multimillion-dollar dispute between the Spanish league and its Qatari broadcast partner, beIN Media Group, is the latest flare-up in the battle between two of the most powerful men in soccer.
dc:creator: Tariq Panja
media:description: The La Liga president, Javier Tebas, has been a vocal critic of the spending by Gulf-owned clubs, and Qatar-owned Paris St.-Germain in particular.
